verses.verse: And Thence <S%G2547><s%> Rising Up <S%G450><s%> He Comes <S%G2064><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Borders <S%G3725><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Judea, <S%G2449><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Other Side <S%G4008><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Jordan. <S%G2446><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Come Together <S%G4848><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> Crowds <S%G3793><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> He Had Been Accustomed <S%G1486><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> He Taught <S%G1321><s%> Them. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Coming To Him <S%G4334><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> Asked <S%G1905><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> It Is Lawful <S%G1832><s%> For A Husband <S%G435><s%> A Wife <S%G1135><s%> To Put Away, <S%G630><s%> Tempting <S%G3985><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>
<S%G3588><s%> But He <S%G1161><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> Did Command <S%G1781><s%> Moses? <S%G3475><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And They <S%G1161><s%> , Said, <S%G2036><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> Allowed <S%G2010><s%> A Bill <S%G975><s%> Of Divorce <S%G647><s%> To Write, <S%G1125><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Put Away. <S%G630><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> In View Of <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4641><s%> Your Hardheartedness <S%G5216><s%> He Wrote <S%G1125><s%> For You <S%G5213><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1785><s%> This Commandment; <S%G3778><s%>

<S%G575><s%> But From The <S%G1161><s%> Beginning <S%G746><s%> Of Creation <S%G2937><s%> Male <S%G730><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Female <S%G2338><s%> Made <S%G4160><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

On Account Of <S%G1752><s%> This <S%G5127><s%> Shall Leave <S%G2641><s%> A Man <S%G444><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> His Father <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Mother, <S%G3384><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Shall Be Joined <S%G4347><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1135><s%> His Wife, <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> Flesh <S%G4561><s%> <S%G1520><s%> So That <S%G5620><s%> No Longer <S%G3765><s%> Are They <S%G1526><s%> Two, <S%G1417><s%> But <S%G235><s%> <S%G1520><s%> Flesh. <S%G4561><s%>
What <S%G3739><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> United Together, <S%G4801><s%> <S%G444><s%> Man <S%G3361><s%> Let Not Separate. <S%G5563><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> House <S%G3614><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> His Disciples <S%G846><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Same Thing <S%G846><s%> Asked <S%G1905><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Says <S%G3004><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> <S%G3739><s%> Whoever <S%G1437><s%> Should Put Away <S%G630><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1135><s%> His Wife <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Should Marry <S%G1060><s%> Another, <S%G243><s%> Commits Adultery <S%G3429><s%> ' Against <S%G1909><s%> Her. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> A Woman <S%G1135><s%> Should Put Away <S%G630><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G435><s%> Her Husband <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Be Married <S%G1060><s%> , To Another, <S%G243><s%> She Commits Adultery. <S%G3429><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They Brought <S%G4374><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> Little Children, <S%G3813><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> He Might Touch <S%G680><s%> Them. <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But The <S%G1161><s%> Disciples <S%G3101><s%> Rebuked <S%G2008><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Brought Them. <S%G4374><s%>

<S%G1492><s%> But Having Seen It <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Was Indignant, <S%G23><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Suffer <S%G863><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Little Children <S%G3813><s%> To Come <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Me, <S%G3165><s%> <S%G2532><s%> And <S%G3361><s%> Do Not Hinder <S%G2967><s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Them; <S%G1063><s%> For Of Such <S%G5108><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God. <S%G2316><s%>

Verily <S%G281><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> Whoever <S%G3361><s%> Shall Not Receive <S%G1209><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> A Little Child, <S%G3813><s%> <S%G3756><s%> In No Wise <S%G3361><s%> Shall Enter <S%G1525><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> It. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Taken In His Arms <S%G1723><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> Having Laid His <S%G5087><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Hands <S%G5495><s%> ' On <S%G1909><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> He Blessed <S%G2127><s%> , Them. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1607><s%> As He Went Forth <S%G846><s%> Into The <S%G1519><s%> Way, <S%G3598><s%> Running Up <S%G4370><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Kneeling Down To <S%G1120><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Asked <S%G1905><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Teacher <S%G1320><s%> Good, <S%G18><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Shall I Do <S%G4160><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Life <S%G2222><s%> Eternal <S%G166><s%> I May Inherit? <S%G2816><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Why <S%G5101><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> Callest Thou <S%G3004><s%> Good? <S%G18><s%> No One Is <S%G3762><s%> <S%G18><s%> Good <S%G1487><s%> Except <S%G3361><s%> One, <S%G1520><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> Commandments <S%G1785><s%> <S%G1492><s%> Thou Knowest : <S%G3361><s%> <S%G3431><s%> Thou Shouldest Not Commit Adultery; <S%G3361><s%> <S%G5407><s%> Thou Shouldest Not Commit Murder; <S%G3361><s%> <S%G2813><s%> Thou Shouldest Not Steal; <S%G3361><s%> <S%G5576><s%> Thou Shouldest Not Bear False Witness; <S%G3361><s%> Thou Shouldest Not Defraud; <S%G650><s%> Honour <S%G5091><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> Thy Father <S%G4675><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Mother. <S%G3384><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And He <S%G1161><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Teacher, <S%G1320><s%> These <S%G5023><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Have I Kept <S%G5442><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> Youth <S%G3503><s%> My. <S%G3450><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Looking Upon <S%G1689><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Loved <S%G25><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> One Thing <S%G1520><s%> To Thee <S%G4671><s%> Is Lacking : <S%G5302><s%> Go, <S%G5217><s%> As Much As <S%G3745><s%> Thou Hast <S%G2192><s%> Sell <S%G4453><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Give <S%G1325><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Poor, <S%G4434><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Thou Shalt Have <S%G2192><s%> Treasure <S%G2344><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Heaven; <S%G3772><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Come, <S%G1204><s%> Follow <S%G190><s%> Me, <S%G3427><s%> Taking Up <S%G142><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Cross. <S%G4716><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But He, <S%G1161><s%> Being Sad <S%G4768><s%> At <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word, <S%G3056><s%> Went Away <S%G565><s%> <S%G3076><s%> <S%G2258><s%> Grieved, <S%G1063><s%> For He Had <S%G2192><s%> Possessions <S%G2933><s%> Many. <S%G4183><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Looking Around <S%G4017><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> To His Disciples, <S%G846><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> Difficultly <S%G1423><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Riches <S%G5536><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> Shall Enter! <S%G1525><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And The <S%G1161><s%> Disciples <S%G3101><s%> Were Astonished <S%G2284><s%> At <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3056><s%> His Words. <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Children, <S%G5043><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> Difficult <S%G1422><s%> It Is For <S%G2076><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Trust <S%G3982><s%> In <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> , Riches <S%G5536><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> To Enter! <S%G1525><s%>

Easier <S%G2123><s%> It Is For <S%G2076><s%> A Camel <S%G2574><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Eye <S%G5168><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Needle <S%G4476><s%> To Pass, <S%G1525><s%> Than For <S%G2228><s%> A Rich Man <S%G4145><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> To Enter. <S%G1525><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And They <S%G1161><s%> Exceedingly <S%G4057><s%> Were Astonished, <S%G1605><s%> Saying <S%G3004><s%> Among <S%G4314><s%> Themselves, <S%G1438><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> Is Able <S%G1410><s%> To Be Saved? <S%G4982><s%>

<S%G1689><s%> But Looking On <S%G1161><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Says, <S%G3004><s%> With <S%G3844><s%> Men It Is <S%G444><s%> Impossible, <S%G102><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> With <S%G3844><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God; <S%G2316><s%> <S%G3956><s%> For All Things <S%G1063><s%> Possible <S%G1415><s%> Are <S%G2076><s%> With <S%G3844><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Began <S%G756><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> To Say <S%G3004><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> , Lo, <S%G2400><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> Left <S%G863><s%> All, <S%G3956><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Followed <S%G190><s%> Thee. <S%G4671><s%>

<S%G611><s%> But Answering <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> Verily <S%G281><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> No One <S%G3762><s%> There Is <S%G2076><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Has Left <S%G863><s%> House <S%G3614><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Brothers, <S%G80><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Sisters, <S%G79><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Mother, <S%G3384><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> , Wife, <S%G1135><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Children, <S%G5043><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Lands, <S%G68><s%> For The Sake Of <S%G1752><s%> Me <S%G1700><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Glad Tidings, <S%G2098><s%>

<S%G1437><s%> <S%G3361><s%> That Shall Not Receive <S%G2983><s%> A Hundredfold <S%G1542><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2540><s%> This Time : <S%G5129><s%> Houses <S%G3614><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Brothers <S%G80><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sisters <S%G79><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Mothers <S%G3384><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Children <S%G5043><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Lands, <S%G68><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Persecutions, <S%G1375><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Age <S%G165><s%> <S%G3588><s%> That Is Coming <S%G2064><s%> Life <S%G2222><s%> Eternal. <S%G166><s%>
Many <S%G4183><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> First <S%G4413><s%> Last, <S%G2078><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Last <S%G2078><s%> First. <S%G4413><s%>

<S%G2258><s%> And They Were <S%G1161><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Way <S%G3598><s%> Going Up <S%G305><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2414><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> Going On Before <S%G4254><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Were Astonished, <S%G2284><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Following <S%G190><s%> Were Afraid. <S%G5399><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Taken To Him <S%G3880><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Twelve, <S%G1427><s%> He Began <S%G756><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> To Tell <S%G3004><s%> The Things Which <S%G3588><s%> Were About <S%G3195><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> To Happen : <S%G4819><s%>

<S%G3754><s%> , Behold, <S%G2400><s%> We Go Up <S%G305><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2414><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Man <S%G444><s%> Will Be Delivered Up <S%G3860><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Chief Priests <S%G749><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Scribes, <S%G1122><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Will Condemn <S%G2632><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To Death, <S%G2288><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Will Deliver Up <S%G3860><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Gentiles. <S%G1484><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They Will Mock <S%G1702><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Will Scourge <S%G3146><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Will Spit Upon <S%G1716><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Will Kill <S%G615><s%> , Him; <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> On The <S%G3588><s%> Third <S%G5154><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> He Will Rise Again. <S%G450><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Come Up <S%G4365><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> James <S%G2385><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> John, <S%G2491><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sons <S%G5207><s%> Of Zebedee, <S%G2199><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Teacher, <S%G1320><s%> We Desire <S%G2309><s%> <S%G2443><s%> That <S%G3739><s%> Whatever <S%G1437><s%> We May Ask <S%G154><s%> Thou Wouldest Do <S%G4160><s%> For Us. <S%G2254><s%>
<S%G3588><s%> And He <S%G1161><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Do Ye Desire <S%G2309><s%> To Do <S%G4160><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> For You? <S%G5213><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And They <S%G1161><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Give <S%G1325><s%> To Us, <S%G2254><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> At <S%G1537><s%> <S%G1188><s%> Thy Right Hand <S%G4675><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> At <S%G1537><s%> <S%G2176><s%> Thy Left Hand <S%G4675><s%> We May Sit <S%G2523><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1391><s%> Thy Glory. <S%G4675><s%>
